# replaceCurrentItem(with:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the current item with a new item.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func replaceCurrentItem(with item: AVPlayerItem?)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The new item for the player object to play.

## Discussion

The player item replacement occurs immediately and the item becomes the player’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/currentItem]. Calling this method with the player’s current player item has no effect.

## Managing the player item

- **currentItem**: The item for which the player is currently controlling playback.
